description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nIgnorance Is Bliss:
This creature always has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA} and {CONDNAME_BUFF_MEND}. After your creatures take damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA}, a random enemy takes that damage as well. After your creatures are healed by {CONDNAME_BUFF_MEND}, a random enemy is healed for that amount as well. This trait does not stack.
name: Holy Symbol
